TopicTitle: Asteroid and Ship transfer to orbit.

Articles.Content: Hello everyone. It's been a long time since playing KSP. I used to have a mod that allows you to place an asteroid or ship into a selected orbit and I can't find it and can't remember which mod it was. Anyone have a clue?

Sounds like Hyperedit.

(And moved to the modding section.)

Edited August 1, 2015 by Vanamonde
